mapper.insert: insert into t_classroom_use (id, useClrId, useApplyTime, useClrTime, useAuditTime, useThrough, useClrName) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{useClrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{useApplyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{useClrTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{useAuditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{useThrough,jdbcType=BIT}, #{useClrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_classroom_use set useClrId = #{useClrId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, useApplyTime = #{useApplyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, useClrTime = #{useClrTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, useAuditTime = #{useAuditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, useThrough = #{useThrough,jdbcType=BIT}, useClrName = #{useClrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, useClrId, useApplyTime, useClrTime, useAuditTime, useThrough, useClrName from t_classroom_use
